itemDescription: British lawyer, judge and Lord Chancellor (1866-1958)

wikipedia_page.main: Frederic Herbert Maugham, 1st Viscount Maugham,  (20 October 1866 – 23 March 1958) was a British barrister and judge who was Lord Chancellor from March 1938 until September 1939.

response: ** Frederic Maugham, 1st Viscount Maugham, English statesman, the eldest son of the previous
* Frederic Maugham, 1st Viscount Maugham (1866–1958); Lord Chancellor
